entry.title: Gaza's Al-Shifa Hospital Goes Dark at Center of Israel-Hamas Battle Zone
entry.content: Thousands remain in the complex that has become a focus of Israeli invasion.

entry.title: Ordinary Russians Feel Wrath of Putin's Repression
entry.content: The Kremlinâ€™s crackdown on opposition to the war in Ukraine is targeting thousands of everyday citizens in addition to well-known politicians, activists and journalists.

entry.title: The Militia at the Center of the Darfur Genocide Kills Hundreds in Sudan
entry.content: A paramilitary group that grew from the infamous Janjaweed militia has been blamed for the killing of about 800 people, mostly boys and men, in a Darfur refugee camp.
